page.title: 15GAMES CHILDREN PLAY IN RIPON
page.content: The games children play in a playground vary depending on age.The young children,5-8 year olds would play games like tig,stuck in the mud and hide'n'seek which are the most popular,but there are many more. Children at 8-11 years would play cricket,football,blockey,peggy,tennis and french cricket,these are the most popular for this age group. Children that are 12-15 years old seem to lose interest in these games. Games children play also differ from school to school.At one school a game may be popular at another school it may not.
